ViewObject.Name: LovItmIdVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT MM_MM$ITM$VW.CLD_ID CLD_ID, MM_MM$ITM$VW.SLOC_ID SLOC_ID, MM_MM$ITM$VW.HO_ORG_ID HO_ORG_ID, MM_MM$ITM$VW.ORG_ID ORG_ID, MM_MM$ITM$VW.ITM_ID ITM_ID, MM_MM$ITM$VW.ITM_DESC ITM_DESC, MM_MM$ITM$VW.UOM_PUR UOM_PUR, MM_MM$ITM$VW.UOM_BASIC UOM_BASIC, MM_MM$ITM$VW.UOM_SLS UOM_SLS, MM_MM$ITM$VW.SERIALIZED_FLG SERIALIZED_FLG, MM_MM$ITM$VW.ACTV ACTV, MM_MM$ITM$VW.UOM_CLASS UOM_CLASS, MM_MM$ITM$VW.PICK_ORDER PICK_ORDER, MM_MM$ITM$VW.QC_REQD_FLG QC_REQD_FLG, MM_MM$ITM$VW.PRICE_BASIC PRICE_BASIC, MM_MM$ITM$VW.SLS_ITM_FLG SLS_ITM_FLG FROM MM$ITM$VW MM_MM$ITM$VW
